casebody.data:
Shlomo MEIRI, Appellant/Cross-Respondent,
v.
Steve HAYASHI; Comett LV, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; and Lulu Aya, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Respondents/Cross-Appellants. Shlomo Meiri, Appellant,
v.
Nevada Title Company, a Nevada Corporation; Michele Dobar; and Sue Dudzinski, Respondents. No. 71120 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 28, 2018

AFFIRMED.
